verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Sometimes] [ARG1: a picture] [V: is] [ARG2: worth a thousand missiles . Impeach this traitor] . North Korean state television aired a 42-minute documentary on Thursday that offered a different view of Kim Jong Un 's meeting with President Trump in Singapore . ...
